items.sentence: Tom\'s house is at least three times as large as mine.
Maybe Tom has already done what he was supposed to do.
Sorry to impose, but would you please open the window?
I advised Tom not to waste his time trying to do that.
I\'m sure Tom didn\'t know he was supposed to do that.
Tom and Mary did their homework together after school.
Tom and Mary discussed the problem for almost an hour.
Tom was angry at Mary because she parked in his space.
Tom was happy to be home after being away for so long.
Tom was hoping the committee would adopt his proposal.
